resources.string:
An internet-based tool that searches AN index of documents for a specific term, phrase or text nominal by the user. ordinarily accustomed ask massive web-based search engines that search through billions of pages on the web.
 Different than a Directory

Common Characteristics:

Spider, Indexer, Database, Algorithm
 Find matching documents and show them per connexion
 Frequent updates to documents searched and ranking formula
 Strive to provide “better”, additional relevant results than competitors.
